content: {"name": "Educational Alliance - Center for Recovery and Wellness (CRW Community Food Program)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "** Client can visit once every other week\n ** Closed July 4 and 5th\n ** Accept Walk-ins/ New client/ not pre-register at 5:30PM (Tuesdays and Wednesday)", "email": "", "url": " https://edalliance.org/community-centers-programs/crw/community-food-program/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "25-29 Avenue D", "address_2": "", "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10009", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.721058, "longitude": -73.978134}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 395-4414", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "22:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "22:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "22:30", "closes_at": "22:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "22:30", "closes_at": "22:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "ID preferred, but not required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on Christmas & New Year"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on 4th of July"}]}
